Question
========

If you roll up two pure dice at the same time then there are 36 possible outcomes. Define the event *A* as: the sum of the number of eyes is greater than 6, and *B* as: the sum of the number of eyes is less than 6. Which statement below is correct? \ I. For event *A*, there are 18 outcomes.______________. II. Event *B* also involves 18 outcomes.

Answerlist
----------

* I is TRUE and II is false.
* I is TRUE and II is false.
* I is false and II is true.
* I is false and II is false

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* I is TRUE and II is TRUE: Incorrect
* I is TRUE and II is false: Incorrect
* I is false and II is true: Incorrect
* I is untrue and II is untrue: Correct
